name: Custom Lip Balm Corporate Events Wedding Favor Bridal Shower Customizeable
description:
500 Custom Lip Balm Corporate Events Wedding Favor Bridal Shower Customizeable

Make a splash at your event! These stylish lip balms with custom label tailored to your event will be carried around by your guests and clients and they'll remember you and your event every time they apply it!

The possibilities are endless, I can use your corporate logo for the label, or use one of my cheerful templates and customize the text. Great for birthday parties, weddings, bridal showers, baby showers, sporting events, and corporate picnics.

Let your guest know you care by providing handmade, high quality lip balm, made with my special formula that I developed in house that contains both raw shea butter and raw cocoa butter. Vegan options available.

Buying supplies in bulk allows me to offer a great price, which includes domestic shipping. Please allow 2 weeks for delivery. Feel free to contact me so that I can consult with you to create the perfect conversation piece for your event!

name: 100 Custom Wedding Favors - Bug Shaped Soap Party Favors - in Cellophane Bags with Raffia
description:
100 Custom Wedding Favors - Soap Party Favors - Bug Shaped Baby Shower Party Favors in Cellophane Bags with Raffia

This adorable bug-shaped soap party favors are perfect for a garden-themed wedding or baby shower! 

Made from natural, detergent-free, glycerin soap; these favors are available in a huge variety of scents, contact me for a full list. 

I will custom design a label to your colors and choice of text, the raffia comes in a variety of colors to go perfectly with your theme as well. 

This soaps come in three different adorable shapes; I can do a variety or just one type. 

Please allow 1-2 weeks for delivery of your custom favors.

name: 100 Wholesale Guest Soap Custom Label 1oz
description:
These cute little guest soaps will set your event or establishment apart from the rest! Fully customizable; including scent, type, and label; let your guest know you care by providing high quality handmade soaps for their use. Shrink wrapped for purity; these artisan soaps are luxury at it's best!

After purchase, I will consult with you to create the custom label/scent of your dreams!
